channel.title: Webs
channel.description: So quick question, how exactly would implement a method where it stops people from being able to spawn webs? I know its relevant to a cheat client.

item.title: Webs

item.description:
@lol_space1 wrote:

Rework with UID in the signlink class? It doesn’t fix the cheat client. But it stops the webs from being able to be spawned.

Read full topic

Thanks. I’ll work on it.

Read full topic

item.title: Webs
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

You’d have to recognise all legit server objects and their positions, and stop people from clicking “invalid” objects, which can create these webs you speak of. At the moment, the server believes this object is “real”, and will remove the web, spawning a new object on top of it when it spawns.

Alternatively, as a cheap fix, you can create some position checks on web clicking action to check if the object is on the correct coordinates, i.e mage bank and if they’re not, you don’t allow the web to be cut.

However with this flaw, your server is prone to a lot of object exploits such as banking, cfts, praying etc…

Read full topic
